name: map-gl-compass-pro
description: Compass pro for react-map-gl based projects

scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: npx tsc --outDir dist/esm && cp -r src/style dist/esm/style
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs && cp -r src/style dist/cjs/style
scripts.build:watch: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && cp src/style/*.css dist/style && npx tsc --watch
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm version patch -m "bump version" && npm publish --access public
